code: export var ADD_EXTRAS="ADD_EXTRAS";export var REMOVE_EXTRAS="REMOVE_EXTRAS";export var REQUEST_EXTRAS="REQUEST_EXTRAS";export var RECEIVE_EXTRAS="RECEIVE_EXTRAS";export var SELECTION_CHANGED="SELECTION_CHANGED";export function addExtras(id){return{type:ADD_EXTRAS,id:id};}export function removeExtras(id){return{type:REMOVE_EXTRAS,id:id};}export function requestExtras(itemTypeId){return{type:REQUEST_EXTRAS,itemTypeId:itemTypeId};}export function selectionChanged(id){return{type:SELECTION_CHANGED,id:id};}var receiveExtras=function receiveExtras(data){return{type:RECEIVE_EXTRAS,extras:data};};export function fetchExtras(itemTypeId){return function(dispatch){dispatch(requestExtras(itemTypeId));return fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/Extras/itemExtras?itemTypeId=".concat(itemTypeId)).then(function(response){return response.json();},function(error){return console.log("An error occurred.",error);}).then(function(json){return dispatch(receiveExtras(json));});};}
